meanings.definition: A North American shrub with pink flowers.
meanings.sent1: The rhodora bush in the garden is blooming beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I picked a bouquet of rhodora flowers for my mom.
meanings.sent3: The rhodora shrub whispered secrets to the tulips next to it.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a field of rhodora in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The sweet scent of the rhodora filled the air with joy.

meanings.definition: The pink flowers of the rhodora shrub.
meanings.sent1: She admired the delicate petals of the rhodora in the vase.
meanings.sent2: The rhodora blossoms added a pop of color to the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the rhodora, enjoying the nectar.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks flushed pink like the rhodora in the morning sun.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the rhodora flowers was unmatched in the garden.
